outputs.output_descr:
DDTP sought to support the following strategic areas under governance:
1. Implementation of the African Peer Review Mechanism (APRM)
2. Strengthening elections management bodies (EMBs) and the electoral process.
3. Civic education, and
4. Good and Accountable Governance; by engaging with a range of Implementing Partners such as the Africa Peer Review Mechanism Secretariat; the National Electoral Commission & the  Zanzibar Electoral Commission; The National Assembly of Tanzania & the Zanzibar House of Representatives; the Registrar of Political Parties & The Tanzania Centre for Democracy and the Ministry of Good Govrnance in the President's Office & the Ministry of Good Governance in Zanzibar to develop a National Strategy on civic education.

project_title: Strengthening efforts to Deepen Democracy in Tanzania
